definition: outrageous and unconventional (idiom); flying in the face of (authority, convention, public opinion etc)
heroic/intrepid/valiant/dauntless/fierce/ferocious/violent
variant of 悍[han4]
correct/right/so/thus/like this/-ly
(negative prefix)/not/no
surname Gu
to look after/to take into consideration/to attend to

sentences.english: He flies in the face of public disapproval.
This flies in the face of the democratic ideal of the site.
sentences.chinese: 这做法悍然不顾网站的民主理想。

irrespective of/to have no concerns whatsoever about
focus/with complete devotion/stubbornly
to die without regret (idiom, from Analects)
to launch an all-out attack (idiom)/to roundly condemn/to castigate
even/going as far as to/so much so that
grievance/hatred

that being the case/then/in that case
to defame one person while flattering another/a slandering toady
